records.Name: Mountain Ridge Trail
records.Description__c: A beautiful trail with panoramic mountain views. Perfect for experienced hikers looking for a challenge.

records.Name: Lakeside Loop
records.Description__c: A gentle trail circling a serene lake. Great for families and beginners.

records.Name: Forest Adventure
records.Description__c: Wind through dense forest with diverse wildlife. Moderate difficulty with some steep sections.

records.Name: Coastal Bluffs
records.Description__c: Stunning coastal views along dramatic cliffs. Watch for whales during migration season!

records.Name: Desert Canyon
records.Description__c: Explore dramatic rock formations and desert flora. Bring plenty of water!
